body.name: TV Wall Mount Articulating LCD Monitor Bracket Full Motion 15 inch Extension Arm Rotation Tilt Swivel for Most 13 to 27 inch LED TV Flat Panel Screen with VESA 100x100, 75x75mm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 34 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 1 hr 19 mins
features: Compatible with most of 13"-27" TV monitor (check VESA and weight); Load Capacity: 22 lbs (12KG)
The mount can be mounted to single wood stud wall and concrete/brick wall. Do NOT install into drywall alone!

Tilt: 15°of Down/Forward; Swivle: Right/Left 180 degrees; Rotate: 360 degrees；Extends up to 15.7" from the wall; Nested arm design allows display to be folded flat to wall, Retracts to 2.1" save space.
Notice: Please check the VESA pattern, TV monitor weight, size of your TV, wall stud location before purchasing.
body.description: Will this Mount Fit Your TV ? 1. The mount can be mounted on Single wood stud, concrete&Brick wall. Note: Do Not mount on drywall alone! 2. Please look at the back of your TV, find the mounting hole and measure horizontal and vertical distance , if the pitch-row is one of the following data, then the bracket will work perfect for you. VESA: 75x75mm (3"x3"), 100x100mm (4"x4"). 3. The weight of your display should be less than 22lbs. 4. Please check the TV back area inside the 4 mounting holes to make sure there are not any cables outlet. Otherwise, the plate may block the plugs. 5. Package Include: 1 x TV Mount, standard screws included. *Common screws included to install TV onto mount. These included screws will fit 95% of TV on the market. If your TV requires special screws, they will need to be purchased separately from a hardware store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good choice
reviews.reviewText: I bought this so I can hang my small TV and I like it. It takes the TV off the bookcase and out of the way. I can angle the TV to different positions if I'm in a different part of the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Over all I am satisfied and grateful.
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty decent wall mounted monitor arm. The tilt is a bit of a disappointment very hard to adjust. still working with that. but over all a great investment for the money. Even though tilt Challenged, a great investment for me. I am using it to hold up an old school monitor flat screen 24 inch that's pretty heavy no problems yet. So far so good. Monitor tilt left and right will hang very slight to the left or the depending on movement or sway. hardly noticeable but if you tighten it up not to be tilted before installed problem will correct. you just won't be able to tilt fore-ward or backward. A small price to pay for the most reasonable deal. Other wise fabricate your own tool to get in between the back of your monitor and tilt plate, Good luck lol. My solution is like a picture frame hanging a little to the left or right depending movement I will just deal with it. almost forgot you don't need them but plugs that insert into bracket are pretty loose and fall out easily no biggie a little crazy glue will seal them tight. Over all I am satisfied and grateful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holds a small TV well
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to use for a small TV in our camper. It works well, holds the TV well, is easy to turn and reposition ya da, ya da, ya da. However, it just feels flimsy. Im not saying its not good, its just the way it feels when you are moving it around. We are happy with it, it is doing the job it was purchased for, it just "feels" slight v. a heavier one. It didnt cost much so overall we are happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect mount and the price is great!
reviews.reviewText: I have no idea what anyone is talking about that they had trouble with this mount?It comes assembled and ready to mount to wall and tv. IT even included the screws!I have bought mounts that are 50-200 dollars that were not that easy to install and did not come with screws.The mount even has some swivel to it. and maybe could use a little tightening but seriously, It is all pretty much done with drywall anchors too.I was kind of swayed by some of the reviews, It is obvious now that it had to be someone that should not install a mount or is a competitor upset that their 50 dollar mount was being sold cheaper and wanted to mess with this company.I am glad I took the chance, Seriously I hate reviews sometimes but had to put to this up there so people realized it was that easy. I had it out of the box and on my wall in less than 15 minutes with a stud finder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy this horrible waste of money
reviews.reviewText: This was a very low end poor quality item. Once I had set up the very light small tv it was way to flimsy to even hold the tv straight it sagged due to the horrible quality of this item. Waste of money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality w appropriate hardware
reviews.reviewText: Good sturdy unit and easy to install. The unit did not fit my TV so make sure to measure the holes before ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Can't really complain for the price. It seems to be a sturdy wall mount so far, but the bolts and mounting screws are worthless. One of the mounting screws didn't even have the screw head, it was just flat, and the bolts to mount it to the wall look cheap and aren't that long.The worst part however is the fact that the mounting plate is not removable. That means the you have to hold the TV up to the mounting plate while the mount is on the wall. I barely managed to do this by myself even with the tiny 22" Vizio I was mounting.Pro tip if you need to use spacers: tape them in place to the mounting plate! Otherwise you will be forced to invent new curse words after the old ones have all been uttered a million times for each time you drop one of the tiny plastic spacers and watch it bounce away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a 22 inch 6 1/2 pound Insignia Fire TV. Super easy install. Mounted it on a stud and it’s a rock. Great mount at an affordable price.
